The Game itself is nothing short of a master piece. for some people that is.
This Game is the Best FPS Online Game that would pass down history.
many didn't like it at first but getting to know the game better and playing with random people whether they are fun to play with, toxic, russians, trollers or griefers if's still funny how autistic and retarded the community of this game is. it hold every single possible aspects of gameplay and team work, predictions, game sense, mechanics and tactics. you really have to train hard to get better at this game but the more you train and get you skills to a greater level each day the more you fall in love with it. for me, this game is worthy of something called a world-wide favoured game.
side note: get prime bruh, if you don't have prime cheaters will flood the server you'r playing in.
